idle.description: Multiple idle animations that rotate randomly

actions.description: Action animations that AI can select from

blinking.description: Separate left and right eye blinking with 0.25 baseline

mouthMovement.description: Mouth shapekeys for AI speech selection

emotions.description: Emotion shapekeys for AI mood selection

aiSelection.prompt: Based on the message: '{message}', select appropriate animations and expressions. You can be creative and flexible with your choices. For emotions, you can return null if the message doesn't strongly suggest a specific emotion (about 4 in 5 times). For actions, you can return null if no specific action is needed (about 3 in 5 times). Mouth movements should be random from available options.

selectionRules.actions: Choose action based on message content, mood, or context - be creative and flexible. Can return null if no action is needed (about 3 in 5 times)
selectionRules.mouthMovement: Choose mouth shape randomly from available options - any mouth shape works for speech
selectionRules.emotions: Choose emotion based on message mood and sentiment. Can return null if no strong emotion is suggested (about 4 in 5 times)
